Потрясающая игра, которая вышла в 11 году!
Прошёл сюжетную линию и нечем заняться в игре? То тут есть co-op режим, карты от фанатов, редактор карт!
(Игра 11 года, а я всё ещё не умею делать карты...)

Gran juego, diferente y muy divertido, entretenido juego de lógica, táctica y estrategia para resolver los puzles que van apareciendo a medida que avanzas. Recién acabo de comenzar las pruebas, pero parece que tiene profundidad y los escenarios se van complicando, lo cual es de agradecer también. La historia que se va desarrollando, los diferentes elementos visuales, los personajes y los escenarios no te dejarán indiferente. Muy recomendado
IT'S PORTAL 2!!! IT'S GREAT!!!! ALSO PEEPEE POOPOO!

this is one of those super rare instances where the sequel game is actually better than the first. the first is really good too but nothing can beat Wheatley honestly. this game so fantastic and has some of the best character writing you will ever see. Wheatley is hilarious and relatable, GLaDOS is sarcastic and funny, and the puzzles are just challenging enough to be fun and interesting, but not so hard that its frustrating or unplayable. overall if you are looking for a fun, engaging, funny, interesting, and overall basically perfect game, portal 1 and 2 are the games for you. oh and bonus, the two payer mode is fun too.

当初最开始玩这游戏的时候，是因为看到sf在跟一妹子一块玩，然后我觉得风格很喜欢，适合我，我就去下了个盗版，结果谁知道，从此沉迷传送门2中，瞬间爱了爱了，后来想过入正，正好那时用朋友的steam号玩游戏，赶上史低，我就买了一个，正版通关的感觉真棒，跟朋友一块练双人合作模式都打通关了，后来，朋友的steam号卖了，我就自己建了个号，现在看到史低，我又手痒了，6个小时通关，还是当初的感觉，这游戏真是爱了爱了，前前后后，这游戏我都通关4次了，这次是第五次，依然喜欢它。唯一的遗憾就是，没有后续作品。

Portal 2 is the best puzzle game you can get. 

The characters are so charming and hilarious, the new puzzle concepts are unique and a blast to play with, and the story behind aperture science is extremely interesting to read into.

If you haven't played Portal 2 yet, then you're missing out.
